title: Over 1 lakh to sit for DU's Arts, Law, Social Sciences admission test tomorrow
body: The admission test for Dhaka University's Arts, Law, and Social Sciences Unit for the 2025-26 academic year will be held tomorrow, from 11:00 am to 12:30 pm. A total of 1,07,701 applicants will sit for the test against 2,934 available seats. The exam will take place at Dhaka University as well as at seven public universities in divisional cities outside Dhaka. Other universities include Rajshahi University, Chittagong University, Barishal University, Khulna University, Shahjalal University of Science and Technology, Bangladesh Agricultural University in Mymensingh, and Begum Rokeya University in Rangpur.
